Player History
Won World Championship with Detroit in 1965...
Injured on 7/27/1966 with a Strained Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1968, hitting .407 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/1/1970 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
